snippet: The federal government dropped plans to cut payments for private Medicare Advantage insurers, and instead said it would allow a 3.3 percent raise.
abstract: Stocks rise, led by health care sector after government says it will alter payment rates for private Medicare insurers, and helped by data on factory orders that indicate economy is steadily improving.
lead_paragraph: The federal government dropped plans to cut payments for private Medicare Advantage insurers, and instead said it would allow a 3.3 percent raise.

headline.main: Rate Increase for Private Medicare Buoys an Uncertain Market
headline.print_headline: Rate Increase for Private Medicare Buoys an Uncertain Market
